item.description:
Hello Folks, YES! She is back! Lauren DiBaise will be holding This Vision Board Workshop. All are welcome! If you have attended this event last year, it was such a success we had to book four other workshops"

If you have been to one of these workshops, Bring your board and either finish it or update it with new goals in your life. If this is your FIRST time, WELL you are in for an amazing life changing event.

Also Anthony J. Pasquale will be there TOO! Anthony will be sharing his Goal Setting Vision Statement processes that he says "will put your life on course" and help you find your CHIEF AIM in life.

This event will be held January 24th 1:00pm to 4:00pm for the workshop PLUS: from 400pm to 500pm Refreshments and networking to kick off this year of success.

Do Not Wait to book your space we only have 25 seats.
item.how_to_find_us: Ideal Business Center Ste 102 " I will meet you there"!

group.name: Danvers " The Secret "Vision Board Workshop Meetup

item.name: " Vision your Success"! Don't Miss this life changing event!
